amendment.description: To make prescription drug coverage available beginning on July 1, 2004.

vote.text: Amendment SA 982 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 54. Record Vote Number: 239.

action.text: Amendment SA 982 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S8405-8407, S8407-8408, S8409; text: CR S8405) To make prescription drug coverage available beginning on July 1, 2004.
